title: Steal a Githyanki Egg
content:
u can also give her the Owlbear egg if you pass the checks. If you do not give the egg, you get the chance to give the egg to another lodge member in Lower City, Baldur's Gate.

How to unlock Steal a Githyanki Egg

Lady Esther/ Rosymorn Monastery Trail
